name: GithubFlowVersion
description: Uses pull request history, releases and tags to generate a semantic version
author: Jarlotee

inputs.name: gitHubConnection
inputs.label: GitHub Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the name of the GitHub service connection to use to connect to the repository. The connection must be based on a user's OAuth or a GitHub personal access token. Learn more about service connections [here](https://aka.ms/AA3am5s).

inputs.name: gitHubEnterpriseConnection
inputs.label: GitHub Enterprise Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the name of the GitHub Enterprise service connection to use to connect to the repository. The connection must be based on a user's OAuth or a GitHub personal access token. Learn more about service connections [here](https://aka.ms/AA3am5s).

inputs.name: isHotFix
inputs.label: Hotfix
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates whether the build is a hotfix. Ignores versioning in favor of adding build metadata.

inputs.name: preReleaseSuffix
inputs.label: Pre-release Suffix
inputs.helpMarkDown: A suffix to indicate a pre-release such as alpha, beta, or rc
